name: I have a bunch of 10TB NAS drives that I’ve swapped out for larger drives in my Synology. I’d like to sell them or trade them for more 16 TB drives. Anyone know of a place to do this?

content.html: I have a bunch of 10TB NAS drives that I’ve swapped out for larger drives in my Synology. I’d like to sell them or trade them for more 16 TB drives. Anyone know of a place to do this?
content.value: I have a bunch of 10TB NAS drives that I’ve swapped out for larger drives in my Synology. I’d like to sell them or trade them for more 16 TB drives. Anyone know of a place to do this?

summary: @bkize I’ll let you know what I find out! Currently the leading contender is eBay. But I’d happily just do a trade-in for credit with a vendor, even if it’s not as much money.

content.html: @bkize I’ll let you know what I find out! Currently the leading contender is eBay. But I’d happily just do a trade-in for credit with a vendor, even if it’s not as much money.

summary: @cleverdevil This doesn’t help you maybe but I created a sort of cascade from my primary system to secondary backups, so when I upgrade the primary drives, the older ones get “handed down,” if that makes any sense.
